attributes.title: NEVER GET THIS APP
attributes.review: I got this app because I wanted to see what it was about and keep in mind that I just got a brand new phone( I phone 11) and once I opened the app it crashed and kicked me out and turned my phone off. I tried to get back into my phone but it was frozen and then kept glitching. I finally was able to get back to my home screen but all my apps were deleted, my contacts gone, my credit cards gone, everything was just gone!!!!! So I left and put my phone down because I was very mad and once I came back to where my phone was left I went to pick it up but it was very hot and I found that my phone had somehow melted!!!!!!!!!!!! Unless you want you’re phone to melt DO NOT GET THIS APP I REPEAT NEVER GET THIS APP!!!!!!( alt tt)

attributes.title: This app almost killed my pet monkey😭🧚🏽‍♀️🧚🏽‍♀️🧚🏽‍♂️🧚🏽‍♂️
attributes.review:
My pet monkey nugget downloaded this app because he was the biggest trump🍊 supporter out there, and he wanted his idol to notice him. He was so excited and tried to get everyone to vote for trump🍊, However as soon as he opened the app his whole phone started to glitch and his screen blew up setting his whole house on fire, instead of leaving his house he ran to his room to try and save his multiple trump🍊 cardboard cutouts and trump🍊kissing pillows. In the attempt he lost all of his fur and got smoke poisoning in his lungs. Loosing his fur caused him to loose his job as a paid actress at the zoo, and he spiraled into a deep depression all because of the trump🍊app😭
I’m conclusion the trump🍊app almost kills people.👁👄👁💅🏽🧚🏽‍♂️🧚🏽‍♂️🧚🏽🧚🏽‍♀️

attributes.title: Karen’s Thoughts
attributes.review:
If I could give this app -20 million stars I would!!!!This app was HORRIBLE!!!!As soon as I downloaded it, it charged my daughters card 1,000 dollars I don’t known how seeings I never put her card information in and I know it was this app because it said money donated to big fat Cheeto man so explain that???? Anyway also as soon as I got the app it was raining and my windows were down now you could say this was the weathers fault and bad timing but personally I think the government be controlling the weather anyway much more has happened but if you’re looking into this app I think it serves just as much purpose as those baby cutting hair games

                         Sincerely,
                               Ill be speaking w/ ur manager

attributes.title: Just no
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to see what it was like and yes I am under the age limit but who cares I have a voice lameo. So I could tell from some of the reviews that the app was fake news (and this review was not from a kid just rating 1 star because they hate our 🍊 president) But I don’t like trump because he is racist very racist and I don’t know how y’all trump supports don’t see that. And if you support trump your racist and a white supremacist. Again I don’t like our president because he is also kinda dumb and only cares about himself, his supporters, and economy. He says that black people have unemployed youth well you wanna now why orange it’s pecouse we black and most likely lived in a over policed area💀. So I hate trump. GEM Z FOREVER. BLM✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿

attributes.title: WORST APP EVERRR!!!
attributes.review: The first day I downloaded this it was okay. But a week went by and every time I would use this app I would come down with a fever and my husband would tell me to stop using this app but I wanted to explore the app. Another issue I had was the app would freeze up my cell phone for an hour. The most weird issue I had was I kept seeing a  big Cheeto one my screen and it would say there for an hour while my cell phone froze. Let me just say it was very disturbing, imagine trying to sit down and watch my television show and eat my nutritious snack and I see a huge infested Cheeto. What if I have an emergency, I wouldn’t be able to call 911 because there’s a Cheeto on my phone. THIS APP IS HORRIBLE!!!!!!

attributes.title: I didn’t think something could be this bad
attributes.review: I was just on my phone when I realized that Trump had an app for his 2020 election campaign. I have an opposing viewpoint on most things that trump says so I downloaded the app to see what it was all about. When I say this next part, I mean it... I opened the app and literally was disgusted to the point where I threw up all over the toilet seat and bathroom floor. I was disgusted with how the app was set up as it hurt me physically and psychologically which no app has ever done before in the past. To anyone planning on getting this app, please do not, spare yourself the physical and psychological toll that you will receive and the trauma of viciously throwing up for an hour straight. You’re welcome.

attributes.title: IT KILLED MY BIRD 😭😭🖕🏾🤬🤬😔
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and ohh to see with my eyes😔. I saw a Clown looking Cheeto puff.. and my bird saw it too and it immediately died 😭😭😭AND THEN MY DOG ALSO WALKED IN AND HE HAD LIKE A STROKE AS SOON AS HE SAW THE CHETOO PUFF CLOWN! 😭😭😭🤧🤧🤧And now I’m homeless... because my whole family saw him and died..IM SUING!!😡😡😡👿👿😡🖕🏻🖕🏼🖕🏽🖕🏾🖕🏿BUT overall this app is horrible 🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤢🤢🤮🤢DO NOT DOWNLOAD YOUR WHOLE FAMILY WILL DIE!! 🤢🤢🤬🤬🤬😭😭😭I am now at a funeral as I’m writing this devastated! 😪😭😭😭🤧🤧🤧Thinking about this app makes me wanna throw up! 🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢THIS APP SERIOUSLY NEEDS TO GET DELETED ASAP HE IS A DANGER TO THE WORLD!! 😭😭AND IM NOT THE ONLY ONE WHO LOST THEIR LOVING PETS OTHER PEOPLE HAVE TOO AND ARE IN THE FUNERAL RN!! 😢😢😭😭😭😭T H I S   W I L L  K I L L  Y O U R  F A M I L Y!!!!!!!!😭😭😭😭🤬🤬😭🤬😭😰😰😰I just cannot STRESS THIS ENOUGH!!!!                           ✨🧚Delete this app ASAP it’s dangerous!🧚✨

attributes.title: terrible 🥱😬
attributes.review:
remember when u said “make america great again” baby u made it worse i mean if u take ur obese self out of your bunker and look at america right now, it’s a mess. i shouldn’t be this embarrassed to live in my own country. 
i mean now ur trying to take down tiktok because we are making fun of you 😭😭. the little baby can’t even stand up for himself. i hope you have pain and u hurt a lot. let’s talk about corona shall we? you cannot force a government to open up schools this fall. are you dumb? just so you know corona is NOT a person. if you just tell it to go away it will not. come on now.  imagine talking about your daughter sexually. that’s pretty disgusting. i feel so bad for your family oh my. i hope you get corona since you have a better chance of dying. 

trump supporters, 
trump does not give a crap about you. he just wants it for himself. he’s trying to kill y’all. so why are so y’all care about him? he’s not important he’s just a man that spray tans and plays golf and hides in a bunker. but you know it’s your president right?!

save barron2020!

I was told that Peeta was supposed to come to my house after i downloaded this app. I went outside and waited and waited for hours until i decided to go back inside. I soon looked out my window and saw Peeta brutally murdering my mother. It was ok though because I knew he had a motive. I opened the window and heard him say, “ I climbed out of my head and watched myself implode 😔 a thought without a body 🍃 ought to take a shot of the load ✨off my brain is poison ☠️ and I’m searching for the antidote 🌚 but everytime i find it my defense is screaming 🙀 NO HE DONT.      💫woah💫.” Then, I obviously screamed Peeta and he came upstairs and kissed me then he shoved his fist down my throat and killed me. Thats right, I am dead now because of this app.

attributes.title: I don’t recommend to other people
attributes.review: This one night I decided to get this app to see trip how he’s destroying our country/land/homes/family’s but I shut off my phone and got on TikTok which he’s trying to shut down but can’t and there was this girl standing there looking at me with oranges 🍊🍊 saying don’t do it tell everyone not to vote for him and then later that day there was a orange man looking at me and then I told him to run and he didn’t run so I did and then someone pulled me off my bed 🛌 so I had to get up off the floor to find something orange 🍊 dancing in middle of my room so I grab my phone really fast and deleted the app and never looked back at the app and I will never download any trump apps again 🤬🤯😡
